snippet: Rio Tinto and its partners are cutting output and jobs at the Boyne aluminium smelter in Australia, adding to cuts announced in January, it said on Friday, blaming a jump in power prices....

headline.main: Government Forces Recapture Northern Afghanistan District
headline.print_headline: Government Forces Recapture Northern Afghanistan District

lead_paragraph: Rio Tinto and its partners are cutting output and jobs at the Boyne aluminium smelter in Australia, adding to cuts announced in January, it said on Friday, blaming a jump in power prices.
